input.sentences: this is the restaurant we had our party at . it was beautiful .
this is my sister and her new baby . we love them so much ! !
my parents are so happy for their first grandchild .

output.sentences: There was  beautiful party held at the local restaurant.
The sister was celebrating the love for her new baby.
Many parents attended the happy occasion, seeing their grandchild for the first time.
Even the cousins came to see the beautiful child.
The new mother was surprised the party had been such a hit and thanked her parents for their attendance.
